text: (Ta chuangzaole) ba zhi shengchu: Liang zhi mianyang, liang zhi shanyang, ni shuo:`Zhenzhu zhi yi liang zhi gong de wei jinwu ne? Haishi zhi yi liang zhi mu de wei jinwu ne? Haishi zhi yi liang zhi mu de suo yunyu de wei jinwu ne? Nimen yi zhenzhizhuojian er gaosu wo ba, ruguo nimen shi chengshi de ren!'
